title: Blood Moon Evelynn By EraiViolett

embed.description: Evelynn (From League of Legends) Is one of my favorite characters, specially since her rework, and the Blood Moon skin line is as well in my top 5 themes. I feel like she fits in the thematic perfectly, so I designed her on it.

body:
Just thought I'd share it here as well because a few friends told me I should. Do let me know what you think of it, I personally (biased of course, I made it) would instantly buy it, Evelynn {{champion:28}}  is one of my favorite characters in the game and the Blood Moon thematic as well. 
Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/Erai_Violett
youtube to watch video process: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCV5VwRlWC6JoH2ONJbxTLEQ

replies.body:
And there goes my wallet & my Change Jar.

You should look into getting into Riot's Skins/Marketing team, this & your PROJECT: Diana skin would definitely be popular skins.
Oh you know my Project Diana as well? lol thank you for liking my stuff!!! I hope I get to work on Riot one day :D
Outfit is too similar to Ahri's imo.
Ahri’s what?
Her classic I think he means
was wondering that too
I don't believe my comment was grammatically incorrect.
My comment wasn't a critique of your grammar.
well they are both based in the Japanese kimono, of course they'd look similar... My inspiration for Eve were the Geisha :)

I just think it would be hard to differentiate between Classic Ahri and this Eve skin at a glance. The outfits are almost identical outside of Eve's longer sleeves and they both have long shapes coming out behind them (tails and whips).

Eh, the silhouettes are pretty different. Ahri runs with arms up front with a magic orb and Eve runs with her hands back. Ahri has dark hair. Eve has light hair. Ahri uses lots of blues in her spells while Eve is more associated with pink hues. Ahri's trails and Eve's lashers don't read too similarly.

If Classic Diana and Warden Sivir both exist in-game then Blood Moon Eve should hardly pose a problem.

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7Yxi919X,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2018-02-26T22:20:07.605+0000)
>
> I just think it would be hard to differentiate between Classic Ahri and this Eve skin at a glance. The outfits are almost identical outside of Eve's longer sleeves and they both have long shapes coming out behind them (tails and whips).

But they look nothing alike in-game. The only they have similar is the outfit.

I suppose i don't need to change your mind, if it looks like ahri to you its for a reason, and thats completely fine. I do think though they look nothing alike but the mere similarity between inspirations, which is japanese clothing and folklore (that also has been used for Ionia and the Blood moon skins). Besides, I made different clothing designs for this concept some which look more like pre-rework Evelynn (check thumbnail #5) but people were way more inclined to 1, 3 and 6, which ended up being the design i'd follow through. Anywho, thanks for the feedback, next time I design something I'll try to make it stand out from existing designs as best I can.
That's unavoidable for many reasons.
This is awesome! I agree with you, I'd buy this skin in a heartbeat if it ever comes out. Great job on the artwork!

This skin is really awesome i hope that RIOT will change it, im gonna buy it even if it would be a price beyond the ultimate skin. If RIOT will release this skin this would be my favourite skin in the whole game with no discussion. I love it, it's freaking awesome. Keep up the good work and let's hope that RIOT will see this post and they will change the Evelynn skin + the current one's hair is really bad in my opinion i don't like it at all. In the other hand, from your skin her hair is really really really nice i LOVE IT! <3 I think i don't have to say how awesome her clothes are... Her tattoos, her boots, her legs, her arms, just everything! And her spikes on the back (couldn;t find a better word). Your skin is truly AMAZING <3 !!!
  {{sticker:sg-jinx}} {{sticker:sg-jinx}} {{sticker:sg-jinx}} {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
I like it quite a bit! The use of the rope was very clever. Evelynn is one of my favorite champions as well,  and I would use this in a heartbeat. :)
ah the beauty of Ionian woman's fashion. You've got me sold on it.
My sun rising ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) .

Take my wallet.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Just wish riot would change the original blood moon Evelyn tentacles thing to what you made because the original ones kind of look like dried paint brushes recently dipped into water especially because of the bright blue tips
Dude i never comment or anything, but i saw your concept work and oh my god. Nice job man, it looks beautiful. I'd love to see it in game.
Ah thank you so much! I appreciate it a lot!
I  hope this happens tbh
Omg its perfect. Im almsot in tears. I would die happy if they put this in. Look at her hair and aaah. This is too good.
Riots...PLEASE!!! This is glorious!
I really love this skin, I would definitely buy it ^.^
cool
Dang that's actually pretty good.
That we need NOW.
thats beautiful yo

Well hello there beautiful.
Also worth mentioning that in game it will look like garbage. Similar to Ubisoft downgrade :P
I would empty my entire wallet for an Eve skin like this, that and Christmas Eve.

I like it, nice colours and good use of her body shapes. she shouldn't be wearing as much clothes if any when she is in demon form imo (her spikes should be demon spikes, not a sash) since she is no longer pretending to be human, she is her true self, a demon, but riot skins aren't super clear about it either, so w/e.
